Code included with Zahir (all compatible with GPL), in External folder:

- MD2/MD5 data structures, used to load files in those formats, by David Henry: http://tfc.duke.free.fr/ <-- not used right now
- OpenNL2: Open Numeric Library, by Bruno LÃ©vy. Used for Mesh Parameterization. http://www.loria.fr/~levy/software/ <-- not used right now
- lineqn.h: Solution of systems of linear equations and eigenvalue decomposition. By Szymon Rusinkiewicz. http://www.cs.princeton.edu/~smr/
- StringUtils.h: STL Split String by Paul J. Weiss. http://www.codeproject.com/KB/string/stringsplit.aspx
- OpenMesh: www.openmesh.org
- acgmake: needed to build OpenMesh <-- soon to be removed, replaced by qmake scripts.
- tree.hh, a STL-like templated tree class, by  Kasper Peeters. http://www.aei.mpg.de/~peekas/tree/
- fboClass, a FBO wrapper by Aaron Lefohn. http://graphics.cs.ucdavis.edu/~lefohn/ (downloaded from http://www.gpgpu.org/developer)

Also, Zahir requieres:

- GLEW
